children.description:
the previous action, I can see that the function "a list of the models of current mainstream aircraft" was called, but it returned an error. Since this function is not valid now, I will try a different approach.

I will use the "aircraft_by_api_ninjas" function to get a list of the models of current mainstream aircraft and the relevant companies.
l of the current mainstream aircraft is Gulfstream Aerospace G550. The relevant company is Gulfstream Aerospace.

function.name: aircrafts_list_for_flight_radar
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "flight_radar", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List available aircrafts"

function.name: v1_aircraft_for_aircraft_by_api_ninjas
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "aircraft_by_api_ninjas", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "API Ninjas Aircraft API endpoint. Returns a list of aircrafts that match the given parameters. This API only supports airplanes - for helicopter specs please use our Helicopter API.

At least one of the following parameters (excluding the limit parameter) "

function.name: getbyhex_for_aircraft_data_simple_collection
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "aircraft_data_simple_collection", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "get aircraft info by hex number"

function.name: get_airplane_list_for_travel_hacking_tool
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "travel_hacking_tool", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint returns a list of all airplane types available in our database."

function.name: airplanes_by_brand_for_airplanesdb
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "airplanesdb", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get all airplanes by brands such as Boeing, Airbus, etc."

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.flight_radar: The world's most popular flight tracker API which helps you to create Flight tracker application, such as : flightradar24.com
2.aircraft_by_api_ninjas: Detailed technical specs on over 1000 airplane models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/aircraft
3.aircraft_data_simple_collection: This API gives you information about an aircraft. We have collected this data from multiple sources. You get data from multiple sources at once using a single request.
4.travel_hacking_tool: Complete and up-to-date database with detailed information about IATA airports, IATA airlines, countries, alliances and more.
5.airplanesdb: Get the basic specifications on all types of commercial airplanes.
